food.title: 叉烧 / Char Siu (Hong Kong style barbequed pork)
food.bodyText: Oven-grilled marinated pork belly known for its red glaze

food.title: 순두부찌개 / Soft tofu stew
food.bodyText: Soft tofu, spring onions and shrimp in a seafood or kimchi stew

food.title: 京都排骨/ Peking Ribs
food.bodyText: Pork Short ribs marinated, fried and tossed in sweet and sour sauce

food.title: トンカツ / Tonkatsu (pork cutlet)
food.bodyText: Breaded pork cutlet over mirin-basked eggs and onions

food.title: Curry Puffs
food.bodyText: Crispy pastry with curry chicken filling popular in Southeast Asia

food.title: Teochew steamed fish
food.bodyText: Fresh grouper steamed with ginger and cooking wine
